page.title: 02WESTWOODSIDE YOUTH CLUB
page.content: The{Youth Club}is run by members of the village and it is held in the {Village Hall}on Nethergate.It is held each Tuesday evening from 7.30pm to 9.30pm.It has been running for 17 months.They do not raise any money for charities but they hope to in the future. People who go to{Youth Club are aged twelve years to twenty years. Members play table tennis, snooker, pool, darts, indoor hockey, chess, rounders, music, board games and shove ha'penny. One of the lady helpers works as a hairdresser as well.One of the ladies lives near the{Youth Club. A helper enjoys providing the members of the{Youth Club}with things to do. Space is limited so they are unable to buy much equipment.
